channel.title: wp on Nomad's reflections
channel.description: Recent content in wp on Nomad's reflections

item.title: WP7 Mango dive
item.description: It has been a few month since I started mangling with WP7 platform. The more I learnt about it from the inside the more I wanted to buy new real WP7 phone. Things changed slightly after I have done my very first app(didn’t make it to the app store as I found plenty of similar ones already there and mine was not adding much :() but still as of now I would really be interested in posessing a WP7 phone and giving it a solid try.
